name: DescribeTabResult

methods.name: getColors
methods.description: Returns a list of color metadata information for all colors associated with this tab. Each color is associated with a theme and context.

methods.name: getIconUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL for the main 32 x 32-pixel icon for a tab. This icon corresponds to the current theme (theme3) and appears next to the heading at the top of most pages.

methods.name: getIcons
methods.description: Returns a list of icon metadata information for all icons associated with this tab. Each icon is associated with a theme and context.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the display label of this tab.

methods.name: getMiniIconUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL for the 16 x 16-pixel icon that represents a tab. This icon corresponds to the current theme (theme3) and appears in related lists and other locations.

methods.name: getSobjectName
methods.description: Returns the name of the sObject that is primarily displayed on this tab (for tabs that display a particular SObject).

methods.name: getUrl
methods.description: Returns a fully qualified URL for viewing this tab.

methods.name: isCustom
methods.description: Returns true if this is a custom tab, or false if this is a standard tab.

description: Contains tab metadata information for a tab in a standard or custom app available in the Salesforce user interface.
